remarks: Uniqueness of a left projection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
statement:

pj1eu $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. ( T .(+) U ) ) -> E! x e. T E. y e. U X = ( x .+ y ) ) $.
